fields.label: translate:: Door image
fields.description: translate:: Image that will be used for the door. Needs to have a size ratio of 1:1 if you want the the left half fit the right half.

fields.label: translate:: Background image
fields.description: translate:: Image that should appear inside the door. Will be the door's number by default.

fields.label: translate:: Content type
fields.description: translate:: Content type that shoud optionally pop up when the door is opened.

semantics.label: translate:: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: translate:: These options will let you override behaviour settings.

fields.label: translate:: Autoplay background music
fields.description: translate:: If set, the background music will play automatically once the content is opened. Please note: Some browsers' media policy may prevent autoplay.

fields.label: translate:: Let it snow
fields.description: translate:: Will add some snow falling in front of the calendar. It never rains in Southern California, it never snows on IE11.

fields.label: translate:: Door image template
fields.description: translate:: If an image is set, it will be used for every door unless a specific door image is set for a single door.

fields.label: translate:: Random order
fields.description: translate:: Shuffle the order of the doors. If the "save content state" option is set in the H5P settings, that order will stay the same when the user returns later.

fields.label: translate:: Keep order of images
fields.description: translate:: Shuffle doors, but keep the door cover images at their fixed positions starting with 1 in the upper left corner down to 24 in the lower right corner.

fields.label: translate:: Design mode
fields.description: translate:: When in design mode, all doors can be opened. Otherwise, the doors can only be opened in December on and after the respective day indicated by the door number.

fields.label: translate:: Nothing to see
fields.default: translate:: There is nothing to see here!🎄

fields.label: translate:: Locked
fields.default: translate:: Locked. It is not time to open this one yet.

fields.description: translate:: Announce the content. @door is a variable and will be replaced with the related door description.
